name: ALevelSequenceMediaController
doc: Replicated actor class that is responsible for instigating various cinematic assets (Media, Audio, Level Sequences) in a synchronized fasion

ServerStartTimeSeconds: Replicated time at which the server started the sequence (taken from AGameStateBase::GetServerWorldTimeSeconds)
Sequence: Pointer to the sequence actor to use for playback
MediaComponent: Media component that contains the media player to synchronize with

methods.name: GetSequence
methods.doc: Access this actor's Level Sequence Actor

methods.name: SynchronizeToServer
methods.doc: Forcibly synchronize the sequence to the server's position if it has diverged by more than the specified threshold
